data.text:
College Motto

The motto of Pandit Deendayal Upadhyaya Adarsha Mahavidyalaya, Dalgaon is

तमसो मा ज्योतिर्गमय

“Tamso Ma Jyotirgamaya”

Vision

To provide equity and quality education to the educationally, socially, and economically weaker sections of the society.

Mission

The goal of the college is to prepare young minds of this region to be productive members of their community, society and country at large.

To provide access to higher education to the disadvantaged sections of the society, especially the educationally backward sections.

To train the students to develop Professionalism, Humanism and Social Responsibility.

To encourage scientific inquisitiveness for constructive social transformation.

To accelerate the inclusion of female students, and the persons with disabilities in higher education.

To promote collaboration with industries and other organizations for research and add-on courses for the students for skill development and enriching academics.

Goals

Facilitating a learning environment conducive to holistic development of students.

Igniting scientific temper among the students in order to reorient societal attitudes and prejudices.

Nurturing students with employability skills.

To act as a catalyst of change by spreading science education and by strengthening the people of its vicinity.

To inculcate values of discipline, perseverance, team-spirit and to enhance critical abilities in students.
